item.description:
A Discussion about the Nature of Truth and Mindsets that Foster the Discovery of What is True
A short presentation on Rand's conceptualization of truth -- and mindsets and language that foster the discovery of truth. Short presentation will be followed by a discussion of the ramifications of this conceptualization for all fields of human endeavor. My presentation will focus on ways of thinking and specific language that I have used to "get to the bottom of things" in my own search for and discovery of truth.

Come down and chime in!

Note : 'Church' is a club/restaurant.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Free State Project Tshirt

group.name: The Boston Ayn Rand Meetup Group

item.name: Salon - Truth & the Acquisition of It
